com.tallygo.tallygoandroid.fragments.map.base

Class TGBaseSupportMapFragment

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • com.tallygo.tallygoandroid.activities.TGBaseSupportFragment
        • com.tallygo.tallygoandroid.fragments.map.base.TGBaseSupportMapFragment
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.arch.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, TGConfigurationOwner, TGMapHolder
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TGBaseMapOverlaySupportFragment, TGBaseTurnByTurnSupportFragment, TGRouteOverviewSupportFragment, TGRoutePreviewSupportFragment, TGSupportMapFragment

    public abstract class TGBaseSupportMapFragment
extends TGBaseSupportFragment
implements TGMapHolder
    A base map Fragment that can be used to easily create fragments that have a map somewhere inside them. setMapHolder(TGMapView) is necessary for this Fragment to function, and it is where you supply the TGMapView that is specified in your Fragment's layout. The this is useful because the TGMapView can be located anywhere in your fragment's xml, and the TallyGo SDK handles the setup. Call enableCurrentLocation(boolean) inside of onTallyGoMapReady() if you would like to enable the user's current location functionality as soon as the map loads.

      • enableCurrentLocation

        protected void enableCurrentLocation(boolean enable)
        This method is a helper method to easily enable current location functionality. It will check if the appropriate permissions exist and if not, request them from the user
        Parameters:
        enable - enable or disable current location

      • centerOnCurrentLocation

        protected void centerOnCurrentLocation(double zoomLevel,
                                       int duration,
                                       boolean waitForLocation,
                                       boolean trackLocation)
        Method to center on user's current location with a specified zoom level. Shows an error if unable to get the user's location
        Parameters:
        zoomLevel - zoom level from 0.0 - 20.0
        waitForLocation - waits for a location to become available, then animates to the location
        trackLocation - once centered on the location, track it if true

      • checkOrRequestLocationPermission

        protected boolean checkOrRequestLocationPermission()
        Convenience method to check or request location permissions
        Returns:
        returns if permissions were already enabled.

        Parameters:
        mapView -

      • onCurrentLocationEnabled

        protected void onCurrentLocationEnabled()
        Called after a call to enableCurrentLocation is successful. This will not be called if the user rejects the permission. Centers on current location by default

        protected void onRefreshMapPadding()
